description: Cast far and catch big in the lightweight Men's Reef Runner™ Long-Sleeve Shirt. Its abrasion-resistant nylon fabric can handle long days on the water. When the temps—and the sun—rise, built-in UPF 30 shields your skin from harmful UV rays, side mesh panels enhance breathability, and the sleeves roll up and secure with tabs. Stow small fishing gear in the two zippered chest pockets. Reeling one in? The pleated center back increases your range of movement and won't get in the way.
name: ExOfficio Reef Runner LS - Mens
